insert.sql: insert into boss_vip_retention_day(terminal,device,isnew,paytype,zhibiao_id,zhibiao_value,create_date) select case when p1='0' and p2='04' then '113' else p1 end,case when p1='2' and p2='21' then '21' when p1='0' and p2='00' then p3 when p1='0' and p2='04' then '04' when p1='1' then p2 end ,isnew,paytype,'d_00014',sum(zhibiao_value1),create_date from boss_vip_retention_temp where create_date>=? and create_date<? and zhibiao_id='d_00012_29' and ((p1='0' and p2='00' and p3 in ('001','002','003','004','005','006','007','008')) or (p1='1' and p2 in ('10','11')) or (p1='2' and p2='21') or (p1='0' and p2='04')) group by case when p1='0' and p2='04' then '113' else p1 end,case when p1='2' and p2='21' then '21' when p1='0' and p2='00' then p3 when p1='0' and p2='04' then '04' when p1='1' then p2 end,isnew,paytype
